      • printWelcomeAscii

        Print welcome ascii art/message from data/ascii_welcome.txt

      • checkTodayReservations

        private static int checkTodayReservations()
        Part of initialising to check for today's reservations Includes checking for expired reservations If found reservation that matches today's date, set the table to reserved. This function will init the session's (AM or PM) table status according to available reservations
        Returns:
        An integer containing the amount of expired reservations.
